name: Variables

testCases.testCode:
assert stdout.upper() == 'HELLO WORLD\n', "You should be printing the phrase 'hello world'"
assert 'hello' in variables and variables['hello'].upper() == 'HELLO WORLD', "Variable 'hello' should have the value 'hello world'"
assert_passed = True
